title: His BCs induce SALTY RAGE - from ME! | PiG vs Kiwian ZvT Showmatch (Part 2) - StarCraft 2
excerpt: Part 3 coming tomorrow! I played a best of 5 against Kiwian (Top) who is a former Terran pro who played in GSL. Game 1 was so long I had to split the showmatch into parts. Here's part 2.
